name: Refrigerator Toshiba GR-RT468WE-PMJ(37)
origAbout: Origin Inverter: using dual inverter technology the MEET series consumes less energy and is quieter while retaining food freshness for longer. Pure BIO technology uses honeycomb ceramics to help eliminate bad odours alongside the AG+ ion catalyst that kills bacteria and sterilises your refrigerator. Featuring AirFALL Cooling that lead to Natural Encircle Ai-Flow, which maintain the stable circulation of the cooling air of the refrigerator compartments. So as to make evener and more stable internal temperature, and keep food fresh longer.

details.name: Refrigerator Cooling System თანამბრად ანაწილებს ჰაერის ნაკადს მაცივარ კამერაში.
